[Intense Implement](/Feats.aspx?ID=3732) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 47</row>

---

You have an exceptional link to your third [implement](/classes/thaumaturge/implements). You gain the adept benefit for your third implement.
name: Intense Implement
